item.title: Last bollard of 3 designating the turning into Whittington on A40 from Cheltenham has been damged and mived by wall collapse and tree pruning., 10th September
item.description:
Bollard is last of 3 just before the turn into Whittington from A40, coming up hill from Cheltenham. Bollard has been damaged for at least the past 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whittington Court Lane, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on Skate ramps, 10th September
item.description:
There is a lot of graffiti all over the skate park. Most of the graffiti is rude, and penises. This can not stay because there can be young children about and especially being opposite The Boat House.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Gate, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 10th September
item.description:
Customer reported that tree stump is still in situ after tree fell in January. Now being used as a dumping ground for refuse and dog excrement. When will this stump be removed?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 10th September
item.description:
Email received 09/09/2024 - copy attached. Customer requests that the sequencing of the TS at the location is checked as a matter of urgency. They report that for the last few days the traffic on Cheltenham Road East has been progressing very slowly - more so than for the effects of the current overnight tarmac resurfacing. They suggest that congestion may be the catalyst at certain times, but it appears to be worse in general.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Several significant potholes in the pavement, 10th September
item.description:
On the junction with Chapel Lane and the corner of Station Road outside Barnstone. Despite your assurances, the pothole on the corner has not been repaired. Patch repairs have been made elsewhere round the corner in the direction of New Road, but some areas between patches have been left unfilled.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 10th September
item.description:
email rcvd 09.09.24 - Please can you arrange for the foliage to be cleared from around pole 2 at TS-195 - Hucclecote Road/Cranham Gate/Folland Avenue, Gloucester. Photo attached.

item.title: Temp lights on green for 2 directions at same time, 10th September
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights at top of Paynes Pitch in Churchdown are changing to green for the traffic coming from Hucclecote on Barrow Hill at the same time as the lights for the traffic coming from Churchdown on Drews Court. This is causing nearly a mile of tail backs towards Hucclecote (plus tail backs to Brockworth on Brockworth Road), and no issues in the other direction, due to cars from Hucclecote/Brockworth wanting to turn right down Paynes Pitch (and not being able to due to the cars coming from Drews Court at the same time). Can the lights sequencing please be sorted out asap as it’s been an issue for over a week now and it’s taking 30-60 minutes (varies each morning) to do a 3 minute journey. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drews Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Traffic light sequencing at Old Chelt Road/Pirton Lane junction is causing issues with tailbacks into Longlevens this morning., 10th September

item.title: Multiple potholes at pedestrian crossing, 10th September
Light Scheduling along Cheltenham Road East, 10th September
item.description:
The lights heading along the Cheltenham Road East direction are only on green for around 10 seconds, letting only 5-6 cars through at a time. This is causing traffic to back up to the Hare and Hounds junction and causing congestion on the Hare and Hounds junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
